text:
📢UPDATE: The Coalition collaborated w/@UNICEF+@WHO on country guidance for #CHW roles in #COVID19 #vaccine 

CHWs:
✅have a  role at every stage, from planning to reporting
✅Need to be vaccinated 1ST, as part of initial health worker allocation
✅Must be paid & protected w/#PPE https://t.co/bQPyF9x4E9
